post.desc:
I do like the joke potential here. It can explain why Reimu almost doesn't care about running the business aspect of the shrine unless it's a relatively low-investment festival. That she basically mooches food off the people she visits. Like, imagine her dinner schedule:

- Monday – Moon Banquet at Eientei
- Tuesday – Fusion Grill with Satori at Chireiden
- Wednesday – Street Food with Komachi at the Road of Liminality
- Thursday – Kaiseki Meal with Yuyuko at Hakugyokurō
- Friday – 16-Course Menu with Remilia at Kōmakan
- Saturday – All-You-Can-Eat Buffet with Yūma at Beastrealm
- Sunday – Sandvich Cookout with Heavy at Suijin
